Trade/Device Name(s): Applied Biosystems® 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR Instrument with SDS Software
Submitter Information: Thermo Fisher Scientific Life Sciences Solutions Group Life Technologies Holdings Pte Ltd
Regulation Name(s): Instrumentation for Clinical Multiplex Test Systems
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Applied Biosystems® 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR Instrument
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR Instrument with SDS Software used for real-time PCR with multiplex fluorescence detection for FDA cleared/approved tests
Indications for Use Summary: Real-time nucleic acid amplification and five color fluorescence detection system for use with FDA cleared or approved tests on human-derived specimens by laboratory professionals trained in laboratory techniques and system operation
